sect1.title: Creating/Editing a Control File Manually
sect1.para: If you edit the control file manually, make sure it has a valid syntax. The easy way to check the syntax is by using some tools already available on the distribution. For example to verify that the file is well formed, use the utility xmllint available with the libxml2 package:
If the control file is not well formed, i.e. if a tag is not closed, xmllint will report about the errors.
Before going on with the auto-installation, please fix any errors resulting from such checks. The auto-installation process can't be started with an invalid and non-well formed control file.
